import uk.ac.ucl.cs.mr.acltutorial._
import MatrixRenderer._

val layout = Layout(colHeaderSize=100, ch=30, cw=200, rowHeaderSize=0, numCols=2,numRows=7)

val m1 = Matrix(Seq(Cell(0,0,"label"),Cell(0,1,"features"),Cell(1,0,1),Cell(1,1,"f1,f3,f4,f6"),Cell(2,0,1),Cell(2,1,"f3,f6"),Cell(3,0,0),Cell(3,1,"f1,f2,f5"),Cell(4,0,0),Cell(4,1,"f1,f2")),Seq(),Seq(), Seq(1))

val m2 = Matrix(Seq(Cell(0,0,"label"),Cell(0,1,"features"),Cell(1,0,1),Cell(1,1,"f1,f3,f4,f6"),Cell(2,0,1),Cell(2,1,"f3,f6"),Cell(3,0,0),Cell(3,1,"f1,f2,f5"),Cell(4,0,0),Cell(4,1,"f1,f2"),Cell(5,0,"?"),Cell(5,1,"f1,f3,f4"),Cell(6,0,"?"),Cell(6,1,"f2")),Seq(),Seq(), Seq(1,5))


//val m2 = Matrix(Seq(Cell(1,0,1.0),Cell(1,1,"Blah")),Seq(RowLabel(1,"row1"),RowLabel(0,"row2")),Seq(ColLabel(1,"col2")), Seq(1))

val matrices = Seq(m1,m2)


MatrixRenderer.render(matrices,layout)

input.code:
import uk.ac.ucl.cs.mr.acltutorial._
import MatrixRenderer._

val layout = Layout(colHeaderSize=100, ch=30, cw=60, rowHeaderSize=70, numCols=8,numRows=8)

//val m1 = Matrix(Seq(Cell(0,0,"label"),Cell(0,1,"features"),Cell(1,0,1),Cell(1,1,"f1,f3,f4,f6"),Cell(2,0,1),Cell(2,1,"f3,f6"),Cell(3,0,0),Cell(3,1,"f1,f2,f5"),Cell(4,0,0),Cell(4,1,"f1,f2")),Seq(),Seq(), Seq(1))

//val m2 = Matrix(Seq(Cell(0,0,"label"),Cell(0,1,"features"),Cell(1,0,1),Cell(1,1,"f1,f3,f4,f6"),Cell(2,0,1),Cell(2,1,"f3,f6"),Cell(3,0,0),Cell(3,1,"f1,f2,f5"),Cell(4,0,0),Cell(4,1,"f1,f2"),Cell(5,0,"?"),Cell(5,1,"f1,f3,f4"),Cell(6,0,"?"),Cell(6,1,"f2")),Seq(),Seq(), Seq(1,5))


val m2 = Matrix(Seq(Cell(0,0,1),Cell(0,1,1),Cell(0,2,0),Cell(0,3,1),Cell(0,4,1),Cell(0,5,0),Cell(0,6,1),
Cell(1,0,1),Cell(1,1,0),Cell(1,2,0),Cell(1,3,1),Cell(1,4,0),Cell(1,5,0),Cell(1,6,1),
Cell(2,0,0),Cell(2,1,1),Cell(2,2,1),Cell(2,3,0),Cell(2,4,0),Cell(2,5,1),Cell(2,6,0),
Cell(3,0,0),Cell(3,1,1),Cell(3,2,1),Cell(3,3,0),Cell(3,4,0),Cell(3,5,0),Cell(3,6,0),
Cell(4,0,"?"),Cell(4,1,1),Cell(4,2,0),Cell(4,3,1),Cell(4,4,1),Cell(4,5,0),Cell(4,6,0),
Cell(5,0,"?"),Cell(5,1,0),Cell(5,2,1),Cell(5,3,0),Cell(5,4,0),Cell(5,5,0),Cell(5,6,0),
Cell(6,0,"-"),Cell(6,1,1),Cell(6,2,0),Cell(6,3,0),Cell(6,4,1),Cell(6,5,0),Cell(6,6,0),
Cell(7,0,"-"),Cell(7,1,0),Cell(7,2,1),Cell(7,3,0),Cell(7,4,0),Cell(7,5,1),Cell(7,6,0)
),
Seq(RowLabel(0,"train1"),RowLabel(1,"train2"),RowLabel(2,"train3"),RowLabel(3,"train4"),RowLabel(4,"test1"),RowLabel(5,"test2"),RowLabel(6,"unlab1"),RowLabel(7,"unlab2")),Seq(ColLabel(0,"label"),ColLabel(1,"feat1"),ColLabel(2,"feat2"),ColLabel(3,"feat4"),ColLabel(4,"feat4"),ColLabel(5,"feat5"),ColLabel(6,"feat6")), Seq(0,4,6))

val matrices = Seq(m2)


MatrixRenderer.render(matrices,layout)

### Notation

- Scalars: lower-case letters \\(v,m\\)
- Vectors: boldface lower-case letters \\(\mathbf{v}\\)
- Matrices: boldface capital letters \\(\mathbf{M}\\)
- \\(i\\)th element of a vector \\(\mathbf{v}\\): \\(v_i\\) <!-- .element: class="fragment" data-fragment-index="1" -->
- \\((i,j)\\)-element of a matrix \\(\mathbf{M}\\): \\(m_{ij}\\) <!-- .element: class="fragment" data-fragment-index="1" -->
- \\(i\\)th row of a matrix \\(\mathbf{M}\\): \\(\mathbf{m}_{i:}\\) <!-- .element: class="fragment" data-fragment-index="1" -->
- \\(j\\)th column of a matrix \\(\mathbf{M}\\): \\(\mathbf{m}_{:j}\\) <!-- .element: class="fragment" data-fragment-index="1" -->

### Matrix Operations
- the **inner product** is \\(\langle u,v \rangle := \sum_{l=1}^L u_{l} v_l\\)
where \\(u\in\Re^L\\) and \\(v\in\Re^L\\)
- the **outer product**  \\( u \otimes v \\) between vectors \\(u\in\Re^N\\) and \\(v\in\Re^M\\) is the \\(N\times M\\) matrix with elements \\(u_nv_m\\), \\( n=\{1,\cdots,N\} \\) and \\(m= \{1,\cdots,M\} \\).
- the **outer product** for matrices \\(\mathbf{U} \in\Re^{N\times L} \\) and \\(\mathbf{V} \in \Re^{L \times M} \\), \\( \mathbf{U} \otimes \mathbf{V} := \sum_{\ell=1}^L \mathbf{U}_{:\ell} \otimes \mathbf{V}_{\ell:} \\)
- the element-wise **Hadamard product**
